price: 76. Kaadu nanu keenit abne digaalát ken madluminninoy usun sinni nafsi Yadlume marah sugen, Yallat agleyta haak sugeenimih sabbatah.
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
